title: Did Advice Columnist Ann Landers Say This About Aging?
subtitle: It might be faster if we credited everyone at every age with authoring this quote.
author: Bond Huberman
vclaim: This quote can be attributed to advice columnist Ann Landers: “At age 20, we worry about what others think of us. At age 40, we don't care what they think of us. At age 60, we discover they haven't been thinking of us at all.”
